question1.description: Create a web app that outputs a triangle of '*' depending on the user input integer:
question1.even: For even numbers, a head-up triangle.
question1.odd: For odd numbers, an upside-down triangle.

question2.title: Question 2
question2.description: Create a web app which can calculate the ratios from a user input number:
question2.rule1: User inputs a number in one of the five input fields.
question2.rule2: The app calculates the values for the other four fields according to the number given on the top.
question2.rule3: There must be a button to clear all fields.

question3.title: Question 3
question3.description: Write a code that performs the array MAPPING function similar to VLOOKUP where the input arrays are 'Array1' and 'Array2' returning 'Output' array.

question4.title: Question 4
question4.description: Use any JS library to display a bar chart and a pie chart from the data retrieved from the API.
question4.rule1: Retrieve data via AJAX from: https://www.trcloud.co/test/api.php
question4.rule2: Use any JS library to render the graphs
question4.rule3: Display both Bar Chart and Pie Chart

home.title: Entrance Exam for Technical Programming
home.description: Built using JavaScript and Next.js. For testing purposes only. Not authorized for distribution. Use the hamburger menu to select a question.
